name: to you, for bedtime
description:
a short horror/thriller story that i wrote in college (2019) and that i recently dug up and made playable in an attempt to learn more about making blideos blame.

interactive fiction, made in twine. should be about ten minutes playtime, depending on how fast you read. no jumpscares, just creepy. 

potential triggers include anxiety, slight gore, eyes and eye trauma, uncertainty, and a fear of the dark. 

let me know if you like it!
